meanings.definition: A substance that the body recognizes as foreign and triggers an immune response.
meanings.sent1: The antigens in the virus made my body fight back.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use antigens to help the body build defenses.
meanings.sent3: The antigens in the bacteria were like unwelcome guests at a party.
meanings.sent4: The antigens acted as intruders, setting off alarms in the body.
meanings.sent5: The antigens were like spies sneaking into the body, causing chaos.

meanings.definition: Any substance that stimulates an immune response in the body.
meanings.sent1: Eating healthy foods can provide natural antigens for the body.
meanings.sent2: Vaccines contain antigens to train the immune system.
meanings.sent3: The antigens in the medicine were like cheerleaders for the immune system.
meanings.sent4: The antigens were like keys that unlocked the body's defenses.
meanings.sent5: The antigens were like wake-up calls for the immune system, alerting it to danger.
